title: Java
description: Learn Java programming from scratch and build real-world applications.

pathway.title: Introduction to Java
pathway.details: Learn the basics of Java programming, syntax, and simple applications.

pathway.title: Advanced Java
pathway.details: Understand OOP concepts, multithreading, and advanced Java features.

pathway.title: Java for Web Development
pathway.details: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using Java frameworks.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Work on real-world projects to apply your Java knowledge.

title: Python
description: Master Python programming and its applications in data science, AI, and automation.

pathway.title: Python Fundamentals
pathway.details: Cover basic Python syntax, loops, and functions.

pathway.title: Data Science with Python
pathway.details: Learn NumPy, Pandas, and data visualization techniques.

pathway.title: AI & Machine Learning
pathway.details: Explore AI concepts and build ML models using Python.

title: R Language
description: Learn R programming for statistical computing and data visualization.

pathway.title: Introduction to R
pathway.details: Understand basic R syntax and functions.

pathway.title: Data Analysis with R
pathway.details: Perform statistical analysis and visualization using R.

pathway.title: Machine Learning with R
pathway.details: Build ML models and analyze data trends in R.

pathway.title: Project Work
pathway.details: Complete a hands-on R programming project.

title: SQL
description: Master SQL for database management and data analytics.

pathway.title: SQL Fundamentals
pathway.details: Learn basic SQL queries and database operations.

pathway.title: Advanced SQL Queries
pathway.details: Write complex queries and optimize database performance.

pathway.title: Database Optimization
pathway.details: Implement indexing, normalization, and performance tuning.

title: React
description: Learn React for building dynamic and modern web applications.

title: Android
description: Develop Android applications using Java and Kotlin.

title: Machine Learning
description: Explore machine learning techniques and implement models in Python.

title: Ethical Hacking
description: Learn ethical hacking techniques to secure networks and applications.

title: Generative AI Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamentals of Generative AI and its applications in real-world scenarios.

title: Cybersecurity for Everyone
description: Gain knowledge on cybersecurity fundamentals and risk mitigation strategies.

title: UI/UX
description: Learn UI/UX design principles to create user-friendly applications.

title: DevOps
description: Master DevOps practices for efficient software development and deployment.

title: Financial Marketing
description: Understand financial marketing strategies and analytics.

title: Front End Development
description: Learn to build responsive and interactive web applications.

title: Human Resource Management
description: Master HR strategies for effective people management.
